home.description: Hi, I'm Arb Rahim Badsa. I live in a tiny corner of the web. I write, design & code. Love to solve new problems!

blogs.name: Blogs
blogs.description: Articles spanning technology, life philosophy, and creative insights. Join me on a journey through ideas, experiences, and the ever-evolving world of development.

projects.name: Projects
projects.description: A curated collection of my most significant projects and experiments. Each piece represents a unique challenge, a lesson learned, and a step forward in my journey as a developer.

bookmarks.name: Bookmarks
bookmarks.description: Carefully curated resources, tools, and discoveries from across the web. These bookmarks represent knowledge worth sharing and references I return to time and again.

poems.name: Poems
poems.description: A collection of profound verses that have touched my soul and shaped my perspective. Literature has the power to inspire, and these poems continue to move me deeply.

images.name: Images
images.description: Moments captured through my lensâ€”scenes that spoke to my soul and demanded to be preserved. Each image tells a story of beauty found in the everyday world around us.

about.name: About
about.description: Learn about my journey as a developer, designer, and storyteller. Discover the experiences that shaped me and the passion that drives my work.
